item.title: Should you invest in gold miners or gold itself? Check out these ETFs.
item.description: Gold has continued to soar in 2025 — and this time, its luster is finally bringing long-awaited shine to gold miners.

item.title: Why these analysts expect no rate cuts in 2025, as corporate bond ETFs retreat from Fed-sparked rally
item.description: The Federal Reserve sparked some appetite for risk-taking in markets on Wednesday, but that seemed to fade on Thursday.

item.title: Small-cap stock index posts a ‘death cross.’ What history says happens next.
item.description: The Russell 2000 small-cap stock index was on track Thursday to suffer an ominous-sounding development on its daily chart: a so-called death cross.

item.title: Micron gets boost with surging AI memory-chip sales; shares jump on earnings beat
item.description: Shares of memory-chip maker Micron Technology Inc. jumped in extended trading Thursday after the company’s fiscal second quarter showed that it is sti...

item.title: Shutting the Education Department won’t change curriculums — but it could impact funding of programs
item.description: The battle over the agency centers around what’s taught in K-12 schools, but one of its main functions is sending out funds to schools and colleges.
